nodes.documentation: @dev These functions deal with verification of Merkle trees (hash trees),
nodes.name: MerkleProof

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns true if a `leaf` can be proved to be a part of a Merkle tree
defined by `root`. For this, a `proof` must be provided, containing
sibling hashes on the branch from the leaf to the root of the tree. Each
pair of leaves and each pair of pre-images are assumed to be sorted.
nodes.name: verify

nodes.documentation: @dev Interface of the ERC20 standard with only the funcions we need
nodes.name: I_ERC20

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows anyone to claim a token if they exist in a merkle root.
nodes.name: I_MerkleDistributor

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the address of the token distributed by this contract.
nodes.name: token

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the merkle root of the merkle tree containing account balances available to claim.
nodes.name: merkleRoot

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns true if the index has been marked claimed.
nodes.name: isClaimed

nodes.documentation: @dev Claim the given amount of the token to the given address. Reverts if the inputs are invalid.
nodes.name: claim

nodes.documentation: @dev This event is triggered whenever a call to #claim succeeds.
nodes.name: Claimed
